summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-first Avenue South from Massachusetts Street to McClellan Street, all in The City of Seattle, by the construction of side sewer connections, in accordance with Resolution No. 1867 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
